data.text: @ZEROcovid_edu It's frightening and saddening what we are doing to our children.......keeping schools open while in a pandemic.
@ZEROcovid_edu Isnt vomiting a symptom of Omicron?

@ZEROcovid_edu @SAHealth @marshall_steven Oh, I forgot ^ "open a window and say the school has put COVID measures in place, despite carrying out no assessments or even asking someone who isn't a COVID denier to second guess the policy..."

@ZEROcovid_edu What is the exit plan for this btw? @SAHealth @marshall_steven go to school until infected, have X weeks at home, pray for a "good" case, go back to school without changing any behaviours until infected...rinse and repeat until you go to university?

@football_roos @CountryBee2 @ZEROcovid_edu @NattyBeaks @JayneFlan @BigBadDenis @RageSheen “The hand sanitiser resistant gastro” has been going around my kids schools too…My niece had “omicron-gastro-covid” Omicron is causing severe diarrhoea and vomiting in kids.Please “pass it on” And not by returning to school asap!
@ZEROcovid_edu @NjbBari3 Complete and utter madness. Spreading rapidly in my school and barely any students wearing masks now of course 🙄

@CountryBee2 @ZEROcovid_edu I’m also not convinced the gastro outbreak isn’t covid-related. After their relentless gaslighting how could we ever trust their reporting again? Of course they don’t care if we do or don’t trust them, as long as we’ve no way to hold them to account they can get away with murder
@ZEROcovid_edu @football_roos @NattyBeaks @JayneFlan @BigBadDenis @RageSheen @smitchellmlc Gosh, what a situation for principals to have to handle.

@CountryBee2 @football_roos @NattyBeaks @JayneFlan @BigBadDenis @RageSheen Update from Coniston PS - situation seems to be worsening, but school remains open guaranteeing ongoing spread to more students, teachers, broader community. A snapshot of what’s probably occurring in most schools across NSW. How will @smitchellmlc spin this into a success story? https://t.co/x0vzN1KgKa
@football_roos @ZEROcovid_edu @NattyBeaks @JayneFlan @BigBadDenis @RageSheen That's a significant number of absences.
